name: RedmiBook Pro Core i5 11th Gen - (8 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 11 Home) Thin and Light Laptop  (15.6 inch, Charcoal Gray, 1.8 kg, With MS Office)
note: The Windows 11 Upgrade rollout plan is scheduled to begin in late 2021 and will continue into 2022. The specific timing will vary as per the device.

description.Efficient Processor: Equipped with the 11th Generation TigerLake Intel Core i5-11300H H35 processor, the RedmiBook Pro Notebook delivers superior performance. So, whether you want to use it for work or to watch videos or play games, this notebook helps meet all your computing requirements.
description.Anti-glare Full HD Display: Thanks to its 39.62 cm (15.6) anti-glare display, which boasts Full HD resolution, this notebook renders lifelike picture quality. This means that you can have a great visual experience while watching your favourite videos, movies, or while working on graphic-rich presentations
description.8 GB DDR RAM and 512 GB SSD: This notebook comes with an 8 GB DDR4 RAM clocked at 3200 MHz, allowing you to run multiple applications simultaneously. And, integrated with a 512 GB SSD, this notebook lets you quickly transfer data and offers quick boot and wake-up times.
description.Long Battery Life: With a battery life of up to 10 hours on a single charge, this notebook ensures that you donâ€™t have to worry about charging your notebook time and again.
description.Stereo Speakers: Fitted with two 2 W stereo speakers, this notebook ensures high-quality audio. Also, you can use its DTS Audio Processing app to select an audio mode of your choice and create a custom audio profile.
description.Pre-installed Software: This notebook is pre-installed with software, such as Windows 10, Microsoft Office Home and Student 2019 Edition, making it the ideal choice for work. As an added advantage, you can upgrade your RedmiBook Pro Notebook to Windows 11 for free, whenever it is available. And, its Mi SmartShare software allows you to easily transfer files between your phone and notebook.
description.Number of Connectivity Options: You can connect this notebook with a wide range of devices, thanks to its multiple connectivity options. Its Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 support ensures a reliable wireless connection. Moreover, to help meet all your connectivity needs, this notebook comes with a USB 2.0 port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports, an HDMI 1.4 port, an RJ45 LAN port, a 3.5 mm combo audio jack, an SD card reader, and a charging port.

General.Sales Package: 1 Laptop, 1 Power Adaptor, 1 Power cord, User Manual

Processor and Memory Features.Clock Speed: 3.1 GHz with Turbo Boost up to 4.4 GHz

Display and Audio Features.Screen Type: Full HD Anti glare display, 81.8% Screen to Body ratio and DC Dimming
Display and Audio Features.Sound Properties: 2 x 2W Stereo Speakers With DTS Audio Processing

Additional Features.Keyboard: Chiclet keyboard with Scissor mechanism, 1.5mm key travel
Additional Features.Included Software: MS Office Home & Student 2019, Mi Smart Share, DTS Audio processing
